mapper.update: update sss_deliveryplace set mg_id = #{mgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, de_p_name = #{dePName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provimce_name = #{provimceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mg_name = #{mgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, de_p_tel = #{dePTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, de_p_addr = #{dePAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where de_p_id = #{dePId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select de_p_id, mg_id, de_p_name, provimce_name, city_name, mg_name, de_p_tel, de_p_addr, comment from sss_deliveryplace where de_p_id = #{dePId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
